title: Love how lucian never runs out of mana
body: Love how that piece of shit champion can harass you infinitely without running out of mana and auto winning lane because he has a dash that can jump thru walls and dodge skill shots +3 poking abilities + double auto attack resets and infinite mana

replies.body: I love how lucian gets to be a lane bully, have insane snowballing potential, have a tanky build, and have basically infinite dashes because he is lucian.
